articles.title: 7 Female Celebs Who Were Shamed For Their Nudes, And 6 Male Celebs Who Were Praised For Theirs
articles.description: In 2004, a man Paris Hilton once dated released a sex tape that they'd made together when she was just 19 years old. The media viciously slut-shamed and ridiculed her for years. "That was a private moment with a teenage girl, not in the right headspace," she …

articles.author: Liz Richardson
articles.title: People Who Knew Celebs Before They Were Famous Are Sharing What They Were Like, And It's Really Wholesome — But Some Spilled A Bit Of Tea
articles.description: "I went to elementary school with Olivia Rodrigo. One time, I was being bullied on the playground by some boys in her class, and she came and defended me. They never bullied me again."
articles.content: "There were also a couple of times when the school would have an assembly or pep rally, and they'd act like it was for the entire girl's basketball team but then something unexpected would happen, li… [+483 chars]
